turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order coffee in Starbucks Espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay so that's a Starbucks Espresso right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. I've got an espresso for you from Starbucks. Is the one on State Street still closest to you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to pick up this Espresso from State Street?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. I've placed your order. Your Espresso will be ready in 15 minutes at the Starbucks on state street.
